name: pirated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of music, films, computer programs, etc.) illegally copied and sold: a pirated video pirated software See
pirate
More examplesFewer examplesPlenty of pirated software, along with pirated video games, movies, and hit songs can be found online.As soon as the major publishing houses begin producing electronic books, pirated editions appear online.Typically, pirated movies found on the Internet are of low quality.

used to describe software, films, recordings, etc. that have been illegally copied to be sold at much cheaper prices: pirated goods/movies/music pirated books/CDs/copies
